about_the_game:
Gear up for Hostage Situation, an indie, fast-paced single-player shooter that puts your reflexes and decision-making to the test! Targets appear rapidly - some are threats, others are not. Nail those split-second decisions, climb the leaderboard, and show everyone who's boss in this arcade. Think fast, aim sharp, and save the day—if you’ve got what it takes! 🔥

Key Features:

  • Fast-Paced Gameplay: Make every second count.

  • Decision-Making Puzzles: Shoot threats, spare innocents.

  • Leaderboard Competition: Prove your skills globally.

  • New Maps Each Level: Adapt quickly for new locations.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.6GHz or similar
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 700 series or similar
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 3.3GHz or similar
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 series or similar
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Lock, load, and test your reflexes in Hostage Situation! It's a fast-paced shooter where every second counts! Targets pop up in rapid succession - some are threats, some are not. Only the sharpest eyes and quickest trigger fingers will dominate the leaderboard. Are you ready to prove yourself here?
